mapper.select:
select count(*) from f_board
where ${searchTitle} like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
where f_btitle like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%' or f_bcontent like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'

select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from f_board order by f_bno desc) a ) where rnum =(select rnum from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from f_board order by f_bno desc) a) where f_bno=#{f_bno})+1

select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from f_board order by f_bno desc) a ) where rnum =(select rnum from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from f_board order by f_bno desc) a) where f_bno=#{f_bno})-1
select * from f_comment where f_bno=#{f_bno} order by f_cno desc
mapper.update: update f_board set f_bhit=f_bhit+1 where f_bno=#{f_bno}
mapper.insert:
select f_comment_seq.nextval from dual
insert into f_comment values(#{f_cno},#{f_bno},'aaa',#{f_cpw},#{f_ccontent},sysdate)
